Posts.Content: Well good luck with your first session, you will have to let me know how it goes, I will find out more info on mine this afternoon but from the scan last week they took a sample from lymph nodes which the report says they look thickened and reactive so possible involvement for me too. Best of luck xx
Posts.Title: ***December 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Chat ***

Posts.Content: I was diagnosed with breast cancer 2 weeks ago her2+ and er+ and pr+ grade 3, I’m attending my first appointment at Christie’s today which I’m guessing is to go trough the treatment and a start date so looks like I’ll be starting my chemo this month. Totally worried and don’t know what to expect. Xx
Posts.Title: ***December 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Chat ***

Posts.Content: Thank you thescriptfan, that’s brilliant news and gives me inspiration and motivations xx

Posts.Content: Thank you leolady56! yes they are trying to shrink it before mastectomy as it’s 4.9cm x 3.7cm and the mri scan reavealed a 16mm behind it also!Â  I will read through for some tips now, thank you. I’m hoping I can manage the side effects as I have 3 young children aged 5 months, 2 and 6 years
